title: 8: A Fast & Fun Way To Recall Lots Of Information
description:
Most of us need to memorize lists of words - whether they're names, speeches, or languages. But what's the best way to do so? In this episode, I explain why we remember things and my simple technique to help you memorize lists, speeches, names, and much more.  

 

If you haven't already join our Private Facebook Community: www.kwikbrain.com

 

Don't forget to Subscribe & Review.
